categories: Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic voice actors

nodes.text: Mark Bazeley (born September 30, 1970) is an English actor and voice actor. He is known for voicing the Empire's Wrath in the 2011 MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic and its five expansions.
He is also known for his voice work in the video games Dragon Age: Origins Awakening and Dragon Age II, and the movies The Bourne Ultimatum and The Queen.
